author: John Cross
title: Chelsea planning new Eden Hazard contract to fend off transfer interest from Real Madrid
text:
Chelsea planning new Eden Hazard contract to fend off transfer interest from Real Madrid Back-to-his-best Belgian can expect a significant increase on the £200,000-a-week deal he signed two years ago Share Hazard's return to form this season has him back on transfer radars across Europe (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Chelsea are ready to give Eden Hazard an improved contract to keep him away from Real Madrid. 
The Premier League's champions-elect , who are also keen to tie down keeper Thibaut Courtois , plan to reward the Belgian forward's sparkling form and performances this season. 
Hazard signed a new £200,000-a-week contract two years ago, but is likely to be offered a significant improvement on those terms to make sure he stays at Stamford Bridge. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
